com.company.dao

Class CandidateDAOImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.company.dao.CandidateDAOImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CandidateDAO

    public class CandidateDAOImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements CandidateDAO
    Class implements CandidateDAO. Here main application logic for working with entity Candidate from MainController. This DAO working with Hibernate, if something bad with connection you can check AppConfig and persistence.xml. Candidate and Contact relationship: One to Many. Candidate and Skill relationship: One to Many. Created by tymchenkoivan on 30.05.2015.

    • Method Detail

      • addAndGet

        public Candidate addAndGet(java.lang.String firstName,
                           java.lang.String lastName,
                           java.lang.String interviewDate)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates and return new Candidate and persist it into DB. If one of arguments is null, or empty("") Candidate don't creates, and method will return Also format.parse(interviewDate) can throw ParseException. During working with BD creates Transaction, if there arise Exception situation will be Transaction().rollback(). list will be updated.
        Specified by:
        addAndGet in interface CandidateDAO
        Parameters:
        firstName - String
        lastName - String
        interviewDate - String that must be converted to Date.
        Returns:
        Candidate or null
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • delete

        public void delete(int id)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Deletes Candidate from DB that found by id. Also will be deleted all entities that aggregated and mapped by Candidate(Skill and Contact), because cascade = CascadeType.ALL. During working with BD creates Transaction, if there arise Exception situation will be Transaction().rollback(). list will be updated.
        Specified by:
        delete in interface CandidateDAO
        Parameters:
        id - int Candidate.id
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
